name: 嬰幼兒認知發展
restrict: ◎必須先修過【HGU0004  人類發展】 ◎課程開放上修
goals:
To understand core cognitive development across early childhood.
To know how cognitive development in early childhood is established scientifically.

To understand how interplay of neuro-biological and environmental factors influence cognitive development in early childhood. 
To be able to tell true science from false science and be a smart knowledge consumer.
To apply knowledge of cognitive development gained in this course to interact with young children.
syllabus:
Weakly Schedule (16+2)

1\. Introduction 

2\. What’s Developmental Psychology? Why and How?

3\. Theories and Methods in Developmental Psychology

4\. How Infants Learn: Why Infants’ Brain Learn Better Than Any Machine…for Now

5\. Play with the Brain/ Exp. Result Discussion

6\. Infancy: The Physical World

7\. Infancy: The Psychological World

8\. Conceptual Development and the Biological World

9\. The Central Role of Causal Reasoning

10\. Preparation: Teach Kids Brain

11\. Social Cognition, Mental Representation, and Theory of Mind

12\. The Development of Memory

13\. Metacognition, Reasoning, and Executive Function

14\. Exam

15\. Presentation: Teach Kids Brain(1) 6 groups

16\. Presentation: Teach Kids Brain(2) 7 groups

17\. Self-directed learning

18\. Self-directed learning

methodologies.note: fNIRS exp. participation & activities design of "How to teach kids brain"

grading.note: "teaching activities" and "picture book" presentation (topic: how to teach kids brain)
